resources.string:
PSS presents you the Attendance Register,an android application to manage the attendance of the students of an institution. This utility app not only focuses on maintaining the paperless records of attendance of students,but also calculates the realtime average and the number of students present in a particular class.Whole data is saved in cloud so no hassle of having any paperwork.
This Wondrous Application is developed under supervision of Dr.Muneendra Ojha by Saurabh Pandey,Saurabh Roy and Prahlad Kumar .
